div.div: Faribault Public Schools strives to empower, energize, and engage all students through its commitment to a quality education and creating an effective learning environment.

a.title: quickLink
a.p: Visit our athletics department for the latest news and pictures from our teams. You can also get information about attending games with schedules, ticket information, and maps to our facilities.

a.title: quickLink
a.p: We are happy that you have an interest in joining the professional staff of Faribault Public Schools. We are always happy to help! Learn more information we need included in your application packet.

a.title: quickLink
a.p: Welcome to Faribault Public Schools serving the City of Faribault and surrounding communities. We believe all staff and students deserve a safe environment that is conductive to teaching and learning.

a.title: quickLink
a.p: Check out our school calendars to keep up with all the important dates as well as the fun activities we have in store for students, staff and families!

div.span: Read More About Childcare Is Here For You

a.title: Kids Eat Free and Delivery Location Plan

div.div: Kids Eat Free and Delivery Location Plan
Faribault Public Schools will be providing free meals to any family with individuals’ ages 18 years of age and under
